name: MEC Great Northern Down Parka - Women's
description:
A Great Northern Parka to take on your greatest adventures in winter. It's designed to keep you comfy and warm as winter winds howl through the streets. The waterproof-breathable material has a DWR finish, a combo that stops the wet side of winter in its tracks. Insulated with cozy duck down that's responsibly sourced, this parka is at home on cold morning commutes or chilly weekend outings.2-layer waterproof breathable exterior shield you from icy rain and slush.Exterior and interior material have a DWR finish to help keep you dry.Insulated hood has a soft faux fur trim diffuses harsh winter winds and zips off when you do not need it.550-fill power duck down provides pillowy insulation.Down insulation is Responsible Down Certified, so you can feel good about your down.Horizontal baffles create tunnels of warmth that wraparound your body.Internal shoulder straps let wear the parka like a pack by slipping your arms out of the sleeves, this lets you ventilate on the go without having to carry the parka.Adjustable drawcord at the waist provides a flattering silhouette and holds the warm air next to your body.Plenty of pocket space to keep small necessities close while dual entry fleece-lined pockets keep hands out from the cold.Smooth lining material glides over other fabric for easy layering.Soft knit cuffs keep the warm in and the cold out.Dropped hem provides extra coverage.Regular fit feels just right, no surprises.

Regular fit



Fit guide

Technical garments, designed for specific activities have features that aren’t always adaptable to general use. For example, cycling clothing is longer in the back and arms. Activity aside, the fit of MEC clothing falls into these categories:





Our next to skin fit that contours the body for no distractions





Our close to body fit with a low profile silhouette for ease of movement





Our standard, slightly off body fit for unrestricted comfort





Our roomy, off body fit for maximum comfort and easy layering




        Sustainability
